Room.Name: Eidenhoft Boulevard/Oceancrest Avenue Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Oceancrest Avenue and Eidenhoft Boulevard.
Room.LongDescription: Oceancrest Avenue, running east and west, intersects Eidenhoft Boulevard, running north and south, at this point. Oceancrest Avenue is the road which runs through the center of the town, and eventually ends up a the eastern entrance to the town. Eidenhoft Boulevard runs north and south, eventually ending at the Lithium Inlet and the southern City Walls.
